title: Sums of values of non-principal characters over shifted primes
abstract:
For a nonprincipal character $\chi$ modulo $D$, when $x\ge
D^{\frac56+\varepsilon}$, $(l,D) = 1$, we prove a nontrivial estimate of the
form $\sum_{n\le x}\Lambda (n)\chi (n-l)\ll x\exp\left(-0.6\sqrt{\ln D}\right)$
for the sum of values of $\chi$ over a sequence of shifted primes.
Bibliography: 41 references.
